data.enText: to move on skates (usually referring to ice skating , if no other information is given)

data.chText: 天气极冷，我们能到湖上去滑冰了。
data.enText: It was so cold that we were able to go skating on the lake.

data.chText: 他在美国锦标赛上滑出一组扣人心弦的动作。
data.enText: He skated an exciting programme at the American Championships.
to avoid talking about or considering a difficult subject

data.chText: 他礼貌地避开了那个问题。
data.enText: He politely skated over the issue.
a large flat sea fish that can be eaten
used to tell sb to hurry

data.chText: 快点，要不你就赶不上公共汽车了。
data.enText: Get your skates on or you'll miss the bus.

ex.chText: 他看到一只鹰在头顶上翱翔。
ex.enText: He saw an eagle gliding high overhead.

synonyms.bx: 指顺畅且无声响地滑行，看似很轻松；也可指鸟儿或飞机滑翔。

ex.chText: 我的同桌滑冰滑得很好。

synonyms.bx: 指穿着冰鞋在冰上滑行。
指用滑雪板在雪地里滑行。

ex.enText: Boys like to slide over ice.
A truck slid into the ditch.

synonyms.bx: 多指在光滑的表面上迅速地连续滑动。

data.enText: used to tell sb to hurry

data.chText: 快点，要不你就赶不上公共汽车了。
data.enText: Get your skates on or you'll miss the bus.
to avoid talking about or considering a difficult subject

data.chText: 他礼貌地避开了那个问题。
data.enText: He politely skated over the issue.

tr: large edible rays having a long snout and thick tail with pectoral fins continuous with the head
swim by undulating the edges of the pectoral fins
sports equipment that is worn on the feet to enable the wearer to glide along and to be propelled by the alternate actions of the legs

example: The Dutch often skate along the canals in winter

value.boxr_value: The plural skate is used in meaning 4. 义项 4 的复数形式为 skate。

value.def: If you skate, you move about wearing ice-skates or roller-skates.

example.ex: I actually skated, and despite some teetering I did not fall on the ice...
example.tran: 我真的滑冰了——尽管有些踉跄，但没有跌跟头。
丹滑着冰来到他的面前。

example.ex: They all went skating together in the winter.
West Lake, an outdoor ice-skating rink, attracts skaters during the day and night.
example.tran: 无论白天还是晚上，西湖这个户外溜冰场都吸引着许多溜冰的人。

value.def: A skate is a kind of flat sea fish.

example.ex: Boats had plenty of mackerel and a few skate.
example.tran: 那些船上有许多鲭鱼，还有几条鳐鱼。

posc.def: Skate is this fish eaten as food.

value.def: If you skate over or round a difficult subject, you avoid discussing it.

example.ex: Scientists have tended to skate over the difficulties of explaining dreams...
example.tran: 科学家们往往回避释梦的难题。

example.ex: When pressed, he skates around the subject of those women who he met as a 19-year-old.
example.tran: 别人逼问他有关他 19 岁时遇到的那些女人的情况时，他就会加以搪塞。
